REQUIREMENTS.page: age < 20 if noble, none for commoner

mercenary: the blades of the weeping maiden

year 1 desc.mercenary: you're making your way through your first battles with the company

year 2 desc.soldier: you've seen a lot on the frontline
year 2 desc.mercenary: you know everyone in the company

year 3 desc.soldier: you are a seasoned soldier who has fought on many battlefields across the country
year 3 desc.mercenary: you've now travelled far and wide with your battle borthers

year 4 desc.soldier: by now, you're a jaded veteran
year 4 desc.mercenary: you're a very respected fighter in the company

year 5 desc.soldier: your name is quite known among soldiers
year 5 desc.mercenary: you managed to become a lieutenant, managing your own squad

year 6 desc.soldier: sieges, sabotage, hopeless battles, desperate charges, you've done it all
year 6 desc.mercenary: after consultation, you were elected by your brothers as the new captain

year 7 desc.mercenary: you've led your brothers through hell, and came back alive

desc.soldier: when the city fell, after a long siege, came the time of savagery, what did you do on this cruel night?
you discovered that some of your officers were engaged in illegal smuggling, so you

a blade flashed before your eyes and then the silence, when you woke up, the battle was over, and your brothers gone
you were sent in an exotic land, far behind the borders of damad, you had many tales to tell after that
an old soldier took you under his wing upon noticing your talent for surviving on the battlefield
an argument with one of your brothers in arms degenerated into a fight, both of you were whipped
you displayed incredible heroism in battle, whether martially or strategically
you took part in a high risk covert operation, far behind enemy lines
the campaign didn't go well, your regiment got stuck for weeks in teh dead of winter
